2022-07-24T15:02:37Z: With that, we'll wrap up this live text coverage of the French GP, as the post-race reaction begins to flood in from Circuit Paul Ricard. Thanks for spending this afternoon with us and have a lovely rest of your Sunday! Cheers!

2022-07-24T14:51:27Z:

2022-07-24T13:49:38Z: Zhou has been handed a five-second penalty for his clash with Schumacher.
